item.title: The fight to beat neglected tropical diseases was going well. 2025 could change that
item.description: The campaign to prevent and treat these diseases has seen great success thanks to a USAID program. Now that program is gone.

item.title: Scientists use AI to help make bionic hands work better for people who need them
item.description: Scientists are using artificial intelligence to make bionic limbs act more like natural ones.

item.title: The VA is making it harder for male veterans with breast cancer to get care
item.description: Male breast cancer is rare, but studies suggest it's more common — and more lethal — among veterans. Yet the Veterans Administration is making it hard...

item.title: Rising temperatures could have a chilling impact on young children
item.description: A study points to a new concern about the effect that heat can have on young children.

item.title: After NIH grant cuts, breast cancer research at Harvard slowed, and lab workers left
item.description: Amid NIH funding delays, reversals and uncertainty, a scientist at Harvard who studies breast cancer has lost one-third of her lab employees and wonde...
